name: s70-api
description: An API for GSA scheudle 70 vendor data

scripts.test: DBHOST=${DBHOST} DBUSER=${DBUSER} DBPASS=${DBPASS} DATABASE=${DATABASE} node_modules/.bin/mocha -u exports test/*
scripts.start: DBHOST=${DBHOST} DBUSER=${DBUSER} DBPASS=${DBPASS} DATABASE=${DATABASE} nodemon index.js

author: Mark Headd
